scripts.unit: rm -rf output && abap_transpile test/abap_transpile.json && echo RUNNING && node output/index.mjs
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run downport && npm run unit
scripts.downport: rm -rf downport && cp -r src downport && cp deps/* downport && rm downport/*.prog.* && rm downport/zcl_aff_writer_xslt.clas.testclasses.abap && abaplint --fix abaplint-downport.jsonc
scripts.merge: rm -f src/z_generate_json_schema.prog.abap && abapmerge -f src/z_generate_repo.prog.abap -c saff_generate_repo > saff_generate_repo.prog.abap
scripts.aff: npm test && rm -rf abap-file-formats && git clone https://github.com/SAP/abap-file-formats && cp abap-file-formats/file-formats/*.abap downport && cp abap-file-formats/file-formats/*/type/*.abap downport && cp test/cl_run.clas.abap downport && abap_transpile test/abap_transpile.json && node test/aff.mjs
scripts.cutUnitTests: sed -i '/CLASS\ ltc_generator\ I/,/ENDCLASS./d' saff_generate_repo.prog.abap && sed -i '/CLASS\ ltc_generator\ D/,/ENDCLASS./d' saff_generate_repo.prog.abap
